"Katana":
"A Katana is a melee weapon that performs quick, agile attacks while using its \"Katana Guard\" Weapon Action to block damage.

Its PAs all share the \"Katana PA Combo\" feature, which lets you access a wider variety of moves by using the same PA up to three times in a row."

"The PA \"Hayate-tsuwabuki\" is a quick strike against a single enemy. It has very little downtime, and it lets you move right before you strike, so it's a good attack for staying close to your target."
